definitions.title: n.m.
definitions.body: familiar spirit (prop. either as knowing, wise (acquainted with secrets of unseen world), Ew vielwisserisch; or as intimate acquaintance of soothsayer, v. RS:JPh xiv.1885. 127)—abs. [[יִדְּעׂנִי]] De 18:11 + 2 t.; pl. [[יִדְּעׂנִים]] 1Sa 28:3 + 6 t.; [[הַיִּדְּעׂנִי מִן]] 1Sa 28:9, rd. [[הַיִּדְּעׂנִים מִן]] (v. LXX Th We Klo Dr); familiar spirit, always ‖[[אוֹב]], [[אׂבוֹת]] 1Sa 28:3, 1Sa 28:9, Is 8:19, Is 19:3, 2Ki 21:6 ([[עשׂה אוֹב]]; ‖[[נִחֵשׁ]], [[עוֹנֵן]]) = 2Ch 33:6, 2Ki 23:24, Le 19:31, Le 20:6, Le 20:27 (all H; on last two cf. Ac 16:16 and Dr:De 18:11), De 18:11(‖[[אוֹב]] + [[דּׂרֵשׁ אֶל־הַמֵּתִים]]).
